Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Well, in my economics class the software we use has AI to suggest improvements. Occasionally it would be accurate but I find that often AI misses the point of the essay or project to focus on silly details or incorrect ones.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Ai is obviously less personalised and specific. I would rather a person take the time to explain something than a machine.
